urls.title: PAENG ADVISORY NO. 1
urls.description: (Updated as of October 29, 11:00 AM) We are closely monitoring the track of Tropical Storm ‘Paeng’ (international codename: “Nalgae”), which is expected to cross through parts of central Luzon and affect other areas of the Philippines on October 29 (Saturday) and October 30 (Sunday). Most flights to and from Manila (MNL) are still slated to operate on both days. Nonetheless, if the storm remains on its current path or veers closer to the Metro Manila and Clark areas, Philippine Airlines may have to

urls.title: Mabuhay Miles
urls.description: Mabuhay Miles. 514,741 likes · 136 talking about this. This is the OFFICIAL fan page of Mabuhay Miles--Philippine Airlines' Frequent Flyer Rewards Program

data.text:
@natenoeyes Hi Nathan. Passengers affected of the flight cancellation have the option to reroute. For further assistance, you may contact Mabuhay Miles at +632 8855 8888 or through their Social Media pages: 
Facebook page: https://t.co/BckaE6Ifep
Twitter: @PALMabuhayMiles

Thank you.

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotline.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

urls.title: CEBU AIRPORT RESUMES PARTIAL OPERATIONS FOR OCTOBER 25
urls.description: Domestic flights to and from Cebu will be allowed to operate on a limited basis on Tuesday, October 25, 2022, as the Mactan-Cebu International Airport (CEB) resumes partial operations tomorrow. Accordingly, for October 25, we plan to operate our standard schedule of PAL domestic flights during the permitted daylight hours on all our routes between Cebu and other airports in the Philippines, subject to favorable weather conditions. However, there may be a need to cancel certain flights in view of the
